line.comment: * Mordan9 - Better default recycling from Capital Shipyard
* Check that we really have the stuff we want to recycle.
* Get costs.
* The recycling part.
* Also strip the ship if it exists, and recycle the wares for AI.
* ZH 2.0 - lasers + shields not recyclable
* This adds people back to the outpost, when you recycle a ship.
* MordanC - Recycling Yaki ships now only gives minimum people. This fixes exploit.
* Undock docked ships.
* Remove the wares we've recycled.
* reverse engineering
* MordanC - Adjust to a teired system:
* Now, it will take 3 ships to get up to 75% progress, but you can go further and progress up to 85% now with Recycling.
* Also, advanced ships can now give progress, but only up to 50%.
* Herobetty: OCV playthroughs do not allow research.
* Renegade Add-Ons v1.0: Fixed bug with recycling returning flat values rather than percentage-based values.
* Determine the reverse engineering cap. 50% for advanced ships, 85% otherwise.
* Progress at -1 means that the project is already completed. We want to add progress if the project has less than 85% completion.
* Current Progress % Progress % to add (max value)
* 51-85 10, with cap at 85
* Cap all reverse engineering at 85%. Advanced ships are capped at 50% instead.

line.text: ' has been partially reverse engineered. Current progress of blueprint research: '

Now, it will take 3 ships to get up to 75% progress, but you can go further and progress up to 85% now with Recycling.
Also, advanced ships can now give progress, but only up to 50%.
Herobetty: OCV playthroughs do not allow research.
Renegade Add-Ons v1.0: Fixed bug with recycling returning flat values rather than percentage-based values.

Progress at -1 means that the project is already completed. We want to add progress if the project has less than 85% completion.
Current Progress % Progress % to add (max value)
51-85 10, with cap at 85
Cap all reverse engineering at 85%. Advanced ships are capped at 50% instead.
